org.ensembl.driver
Interface FeatureAdaptor

All Superinterfaces:
Adaptor, java.rmi.Remote
All Known Subinterfaces:
AffyFeatureAdaptor, DnaDnaAlignmentAdaptor, DnaProteinAlignmentAdaptor, ExonAdaptor, GeneAdaptor, LDFeatureAdaptor, LockableGeneAdaptor, MiscFeatureAdaptor, PredictionExonAdaptor, PredictionTranscriptAdaptor, QtlFeatureAdaptor, RepeatFeatureAdaptor, SimpleFeatureAdaptor, TranscriptAdaptor, VariationFeatureAdaptor, VariationGroupFeatureAdaptor
public interface FeatureAdaptor
extends Adaptor

Provides access to a datatype that is Locatable so can be fetched by location.

Method Summary

                                       CoordinateSystem coordinateSystem)

Throws:

fetch

public java.util.List fetch(long[] internalIDs)
                     throws AdaptorException
Fetch zero or more Features with the specified internalIDs. Any internalIDs that do not correspond to Features in the database will be ignored.

Parameters:
internalIDs - internal IDs. The ids should be unique.
Returns:
zero or more Features with internalIDs specified in internalIDs and in the same order.
Throws:
AdaptorException

                            boolean loadChildren)
                     throws AdaptorException
Fetch zero or more Features with the specified internalIDs. Any internalIDs that do not correspond to Features in the database will be ignored.

Parameters:
internalIDs - internal IDs. The ids should be unique.
loadChildren - hint to prefetch child data.
Returns:
zero or more Features with internalIDs specified in internalIDs and in the same order.
Throws:
AdaptorException

                                 throws AdaptorException

Parameters:
internalIDs - internal IDs. The ids should be unique.
Returns:
zero or more Features with internalIDs specified in internalIDs, order is unspecified.

fetch

public java.util.List fetch(Location location)
                     throws AdaptorException
Fetches features that overlap with location.

Parameters:
location - location filter.
Returns:
List containing zero or more items overlaping the location.
Throws:
AdaptorException
See Also:
if you want to include child data.

fetch

public java.util.List fetch(Location location,
                            boolean loadChildren)
                     throws AdaptorException
Fetches features, optionally including child data, that overlap with location. Including child data may be more efficient than having the data lazy loaded later.

Parameters:
location - location filter.
loadChildren - hint to prefetch child data.
Returns:
List containing zero or more items overlaping the location.
Throws:
AdaptorException

fetchIterator

public java.util.Iterator fetchIterator()
                                 throws AdaptorException
Returns an iterator over all Features of this type in the database. Returns the same Features as FetchAll() but uses much less memory.

Returns:
iterator over all Features of this type in the database.
Throws:
AdaptorException
See Also:
an alternative way of getting all the features.

fetchIterator

public java.util.Iterator fetchIterator(boolean loadChildren)
                                 throws AdaptorException
Returns an iterator over all Features of this type in the database. Returns the same Features as FetchAll() but uses much less memory.

Parameters:
loadChildren - whether to preload child data if available.
Returns:
iterator over all Features of this type in the database.
Throws:
AdaptorException
See Also:
an alternative way of getting all the features.

fetchIterator

public java.util.Iterator fetchIterator(Location location)
                                 throws AdaptorException
Returns an iterator over all Features in the specified location. Returns the same Features as fetch(location) but uses potentially much less memory.

Parameters:
location - location filter.
Returns:
iterator over all Features that fall in the specified location.
Throws:
AdaptorException
See Also:
an alternative way of getting all the features., for a possibly more efficient retrieval mechanism.

fetchIterator

public java.util.Iterator fetchIterator(Location location,
                                        boolean loadChildren)
                                 throws AdaptorException
Returns an iterator over all Features in the specified location with or without child data preloaded. Returns the same Features as fetch(location) but uses potentially much less memory.

Parameters:
location - location filter.
loadChildren - whether to include children. Setting to true may produce faster overall retrieval if child data is also accessed.
Returns:
iterator over all Features that fall in the specified location.
Throws:
AdaptorException
See Also:
an alternative way of getting all the features.

fetchAll

public java.util.List fetchAll()
                        throws AdaptorException
Retrieves all features from the datasase.

Returns:
all features in the database.
Throws:
AdaptorException
See Also:
alternative way of getting all features using less memory.

fetchAll

public java.util.List fetchAll(boolean includeChildren)
                        throws AdaptorException
Retrieves all features from the datasase and if includeChildren is true it might preload it's child data.

Parameters:
includeChildren - hint to preload child data.
Returns:
all features in the database.
Throws:
AdaptorException
See Also:
alternative way of getting all features using less memory.
